question: When you two have a relaxed day off together, which relationship priority feels most important to you right now?

answers.title: Getting to know each other’s stories, interests, and quirks on a deeper level
Bringing more laughter, playful moments, and upbeat experiences into your day
Exploring your sexuality more openly and comfortably
Ensuring your life goals and values align well, both now and in the future
Finding ways to share thoughts and listen better, so you both feel understood

question: Which of the following areas would you like to give more attention to, in order to feel closer as a couple?

answers.title: Addressing small issues before they become big, lingering conflicts
Having deeper, more meaningful talks that go beyond the surface
Opening up about tough or sensitive subjects without worry or tension
Working together on your future goals, from finances to big life decisions
Building a strong sense of reliability, where you know you can count on each other

question: If you could wave a magic wand and instantly enhance one aspect of your relationship, what would it be?

answers.title: Uncovering delightful new sides of your partner’s personality
Feeling more at ease sharing and exploring intimacy together
Learning to communicate honestly without misunderstandings or tension
Diving even deeper into heartfelt conversations that strengthen your bond
Finding greater clarity and agreement about your shared future path

question: Picture a memorable date night for just the two of you. What outcome would make it most rewarding?

answers.title: Laughing, letting loose, and creating fun memories to treasure
Feeling reassured that your core values and outlooks fit well together
Resolving nagging tensions or misunderstandings in a calm, supportive way
Bravely tackling uncomfortable subjects (finances, in-laws, etc.) without judgment
Building a sense that each of you is consistently devoted and dependable

question: Looking ahead a few months, what’s something you’d really like to invest in together?

answers.title: Discovering more about each other’s backgrounds, hopes, and daily likes/dislikes
Shaking up your routine with fun, spontaneous activities you can both enjoy
Sitting down to address weighty or uncomfortable issues in a constructive way
Co-creating goals and action plans for the near future—like travel or big life steps
Cultivating mutual confidence and reliability, so you both feel truly supported

question: Which potential improvement would bring the biggest sense of fulfillment to both of you?

answers.title: Feeling more free to talk about sexual wants, needs, and desires
Confirming you really match each other’s values and life perspectives
Expressing your feelings in ways that feel productive and supportive, not combative
Knowing exactly how to tackle arguments before they grow out of control
Having more heartfelt, meaningful talks that allow you both to feel deeply understood
